mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(userNickname,userName,userId,userPassword,userEmail,userImage) VALUES( #{userNickname}, #{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, #{userImage} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE userNickname = #{userNickname}, userName = #{userName}, userId = #{userId}, userPassword = #{userPassword}, userStatus = #{userStatus}, userPoint = #{userPoint}, userEmail = #{userEmail}, userImage = #{userImage}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET userNickname = #{userNickname}, userName = #{userName}, userId = #{userId}, userPassword = #{userPassword}, userStatus = #{userStatus}, userPoint = #{userPoint}, userEmail = #{userEmail}, userImage = #{userImage} WHERE userIdx =#{userIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE userStatus=#{status} And userNickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{word},'%')
SELECT count(*) as cntCoupon FROM users as u LEFT JOIN usercoupons as uc ON u.userIdx=uc.userIdx WHERE u.userIdx=#{userIdx} AND uc.couponStatus=0 GROUP BY u.userIdx;
SELECT count(*) as cntLikeStore FROM users as u LEFT JOIN storeLike as sl ON u.userIdx = sl.userIdx WHERE u.userIdx=#{userIdx} AND sl.heartStatus=1 GROUP BY u.userIdx;
